channel.title: RS2 Server on Linux?
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape Community,
i can remember that comunity. Used moparscape loooongtime ago on windows xp i gues??? anyways i want to get me again rs but that time for my VServer. So i was woundering how the servers now working. Is that all Windows server which need be repgrogrammed or can i use them for Linux?
For example that one : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456882.0.html
i mean i saw alot of thinks php, js, html and hosted many things for my company on my vserver but stuff like that i never saw.
maybe some one would be nice and help me?
Thank you a lot.
Best wishes from Germany. <- Terra

item.title: RS2 Server on Linux?
item.dc:creator: @terratoss terratoss

Hello Moparscape Community,

i can remember that comunity. Used moparscape loooongtime ago on windows xp i gues??? anyways i want to get me again rs but that time for my VServer. So i was woundering how the servers now working. Is that all Windows server which need be repgrogrammed or can i use them for Linux?
